mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, analysis_date, total_tasks, completed_tasks, completion_rate, avg_completion_minutes, work_tasks, completed_work_tasks, study_tasks, completed_study_tasks, life_tasks, completed_life_tasks, task_suggestions, create_time, update_time, deleted FROM user_task_analysis WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND analysis_date BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC
